name: Twin Fire Advanced
description:
Twin Fire Advanced is a cross over between Galaga, Phoenix and Space Invaders.

There is local co-op and controller support.

Controls are in the game, but here they are:
Player 1: A & D to move, Space to shoot
F1 to add Player 2, F10 to remove Player 2

Player 2: Left and Right arrows to move, Right CTRL to shoot.
